"Dana": "I'm Dana, one of the lookouts here!"
"If the enemy attacks, you'll know from us immediately. You'll be fighting then, too."
"I hear you're one helluva fighter. Took out a bunch of strong DOLLS, yeah?"
"But I only believe what I see! You're gonna have to prove yourself for me."
"Alrighty then, why not swing by Retem El-Nossa and raise some hell? I'm sure you've heard, but there's nothing but beefy boys out there."
"Take them out, and I'll admit you're all that!"
"I see... I was really hoping I'd get to see you in action. Oh well, lemme know if you change your mind."
"I appreciate you indulging me with this. Can't wait to see your future work!"
